attributes.action: Re-consider for a general election due to labour breaking their promises
attributes.additional_details: Our once harmonious country now turmoil-filled, with empty promises  of the few. It's time to say enough! We must fight back. We should be able to live and work with dignity, without fear of becoming victims to a failed political agenda. Therefore, we urge you to demand a new general election and expose the failings of the current. This can be the catalyst for change that helps us regain control of our lives, our country, and our democracy.
attributes.background: to reconsider yet another re election. Change must be done. People are living pay check to pay check and we have no freedom. Labour needs out as this isn’t our country anymore. Enough is enough and we need help to live and regain trust in our leaders and have some form of life again.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
